name: UndoHistory
info: Receives ValueNotifier to listen to the value, providing undo/redo functionality for that value; used in the source code of the TextField component.

nodes.name: Using UndoHistory in TextField
desc: In this example, the undo/redo functionality of the TextField is controlled via an external button. The undoController parameter can be passed an UndoHistoryController object to control and influence the input text content.
